languages.text: "Слова тиран{mf|а|ши}, опьяненн{mf|ого|ой} властью и безнаказанностью". {n}Он горько улыбается.{/n} "Немезит есть идея. А вы надменно считаете, что можете убить идею во плоти. Так даже лучше — продолжайте недооценивать его".

"The words of a tyrant inebriated with power and impunity." {n}He smiles bitterly.{/n} "Nemesite is an idea. And you have the arrogance to believe you can kill an idea made flesh. It is better this way, so keep underestimating him."
languages.original_text: "Слова тиран{mf|а|ши}, опьяненн{mf|ого|ой} властью и безнаказанностью". {n}Он горько улыбается.{/n} "Немезит есть идея. А вы надменно считаете, что можете убить идею во плоти. Так даже лучше — продолжайте недооценивать его".

traits.locale_text: "The words of a tyrant inebriated with power and impunity." {n}Adalbert smiles bitterly.{/n} "Nemesite is an idea. And you have the arrogance to believe you can kill an idea made flesh. It is better this way, keep underestimating him."

"The words of a tyrant inebriated with power and impunity." {n}Adalbert smiles bitterly.{/n} "Nemesite is an idea. And you have the arrogance to believe you can kill an idea made flesh. It is better this way, keep underestimating him."

"The words of a tyrant inebriated with power and impunity." {n}Adalbert smiles bitterly.{/n} "Nemesite is an idea. And you have the arrogance to believe you can kill an idea made flesh. It is better this way, keep underestimating him."

"The words of a tyrant inebriated with power and impunity." {n}Adalbert smiles bitterly.{/n} "Nemesite is an idea. And you have the arrogance to believe you can kill an idea made flesh. It is better this way, keep underestimating him."

"The words of a tyrant inebriated with power and impunity." {n}He smiles bitterly.{/n} "Nemesite is an idea. And you have the arrogance to believe you can kill an idea made flesh. It is better this way, so keep underestimating him."

"The words of a tyrant inebriated with power and impunity." {n}He smiles bitterly.{/n} "Nemesite is an idea. And you have the arrogance to believe you can kill an idea made flesh. It is better this way, so keep underestimating him."

languages.text: "Die Worte eines Tyrannen, berauscht von Macht und ohne Angst vor Strafe." {n}Er lächelt verbittert.{/n} "Nemesit ist eine Idee. Und Ihr besitzt die Arroganz, zu glauben, Ihr könntet eine Fleisch gewordene Idee töten. Aber das ist gut, unterschätzt ihn nur weiterhin."
languages.original_text: "The words of a tyrant inebriated with power and impunity." {n}He smiles bitterly.{/n} "Nemesite is an idea. And you have the arrogance to believe you can kill an idea made flesh. It is better this way, so keep underestimating him."

traits.locale_text: "Die Worte eines Tyrannen, berauscht von Macht und ohne Angst vor Strafe. {n}Er lächelt verbittert.{/n} "Nemesit ist eine Idee. Und Ihr besitzt die Arroganz, zu glauben, Ihr könntet eine Fleisch gewordene Idee töten. Aber das ist gut, unterschätzt ihn nur weiterhin."

languages.text: «Palabras de {mf|un tirano ebrio|una tirana ebria} de poder e impunidad». {n}Sonríe con tristeza.{/n} «Nemesitio es un ideal, y usted tiene la arrogancia de creer que puede matar a su encarnación. Es mejor así. Siga subestimándolo».
languages.original_text: "The words of a tyrant inebriated with power and impunity." {n}He smiles bitterly.{/n} "Nemesite is an idea. And you have the arrogance to believe you can kill an idea made flesh. It is better this way, so keep underestimating him."

traits.locale_text: «Palabras de {mf|un tirano ebrio|una tirana ebria} de poder e impunidad». {n}Sonríe con tristeza.{/n} «Nemesitio es un ideal, y usted tiene la arrogancia de creer que puede matar a su encarnación. Es mejor así. Siga subestimándolo».

languages.text: 「権力と不敬に酔った暴君の言葉だな」{n}男は苦笑いを浮かべる。{/n}「ネメサイトは思想だ。そしてあなたは、肉となった思想を殺すことができると思い込む傲慢さを持っている。その方がいい。そのまま彼を甘く見続けたまえ」
languages.original_text: "The words of a tyrant inebriated with power and impunity." {n}He smiles bitterly.{/n} "Nemesite is an idea. And you have the arrogance to believe you can kill an idea made flesh. It is better this way, so keep underestimating him."

traits.locale_text: 「権力と不敬に酔った暴君の言葉だな」{n}男は苦笑いを浮かべる。{/n}「ネメサイトは思想だ。そしてあなたは、肉となった思想を殺すことができると思い込む傲慢さを持っている。その方がいい。そのまま彼を甘く見続けたまえ」

languages.text: “沉溺于权力与杀戮的暴君，确实会说出这种话。”{n}他露出了苦涩的笑容。{/n}“涅墨斯特是一种思想，而你居然傲慢地认为你能扼杀思想的化身。那就这样吧，你就继续低估他吧。”
languages.original_text: "The words of a tyrant inebriated with power and impunity." {n}He smiles bitterly.{/n} "Nemesite is an idea. And you have the arrogance to believe you can kill an idea made flesh. It is better this way, so keep underestimating him."

traits.locale_text: “沉溺于权力与杀戮的暴君，确实会说出这种话。”{n}他露出了苦涩的笑容。{/n}“涅墨斯特是一种思想，而你居然傲慢地认为你能扼杀思想的化身。那就这样吧，你就继续低估他吧。”

languages.text: « Voilà bien les mots d'un tyran ivre de pouvoir et d'impunité, {n}fait-il avec un sourire amer.{/n} Plus qu'un simple mortel, Némésite incarne un idéal, et vous, vous avez l'arrogance de croire que vous pouvez tuer un rêve fait chair. Mais c'est un mal pour un bien, continuez donc à le sous-estimer. »
languages.original_text: "The words of a tyrant inebriated with power and impunity." {n}He smiles bitterly.{/n} "Nemesite is an idea. And you have the arrogance to believe you can kill an idea made flesh. It is better this way, so keep underestimating him."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà bien les mots d'un tyran ivre de pouvoir et d'impunité, {n}fait-il avec un sourire amer.{/n} Plus qu'un simple mortel, Némésite incarne un idéal, et vous, vous avez l'arrogance de croire que vous pouvez tuer un rêve fait chair. Mais c'est un mal pour un bien, continuez donc à le sous-estimer. »

languages.text: "Elindeki güç ve yaptıklarına karşılık ceza almaması nedeniyle sarhoş olmuş bir tiranın sözleri." {n}Acı acı gülümsüyor.{/n} "Nemezit bir fikirdir. Ve sen de ete kemiğe bürünmüş bir fikri öldürebileceğine inanacak kadar kibirlisin. Böylesi daha iyi. Onu küçümsemeye devam et."
languages.original_text: "The words of a tyrant inebriated with power and impunity." {n}He smiles bitterly.{/n} "Nemesite is an idea. And you have the arrogance to believe you can kill an idea made flesh. It is better this way, so keep underestimating him."
